amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in Part A of House Report 109-346 and considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 602.

action.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to pursuant to H. Res. 602.
